name: Tokyo International Conference on Software Engineering and Digital Technology
content: The 2015 Tokyo International Conference on Software Engineering and Digital Technology, 2015 SEDT in short, offers scholars, professionals, academics and graduate students a platform to present, share, and discuss their studies from various perspectives in fields of Software Engineering and Digital Technology. Topics include AI, software, enginerring, social media, electronics production and etc. All theoretical, empirical and practical papers from scholars and professionals in the above fields are all highly welcome. The 2015 SEDT will be held during December 02-04, 2015 in Tokyo, Japan. Submit your paper Now!
